ygData.subject: Gnome Necro Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a Gnome Necro trying to increase my faction in some key locations, currently Butcherblock.  By killing goblins and Dwarven Bandits I have got my faction
ygData.messageBody:
I am a Gnome Necro trying to increase my faction in some key locations,
currently Butcherblock. By killing goblins and Dwarven Bandits I have got
my faction that I am dubious to everyone, merchants and guards alike. Now
Guards won't kill me, but Merchants won't sell to me, and worse the BANKER
looks at me threatenly (I assume he will kill me if I try and bank). How
can I increase merchant and banker faction?

Also, I heard that anywhere there is a necro guild I can enter the city and
not be KOS, Freeport, Qeynos, & Ak'Anon, is this true?

Does anyone have a faction list of what we can do to be liked (if not for
real, enough that they sell to us). I heard that we can actually enter 3rd
Gate (invis to ghouls) and be able to buy SOME spells there from some
merchants.

Any help to a new Gnome Necro would be great...

Thanks for your time,
Abra
